item.title: Treasuries Slide as Trump Pushes Investors Toward Riskier Assets
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- US Treasuries sank as investors took job market data and a US-UK trade framework as reasons to embrace riskier assets and pare back their bets on interest-rate cuts. The declines on Thursday pushed two- to 10-year yields higher by at least 10 basis points on the day after President Do...
